goal:
ArcelorMittal has activities in more than 60 countries. It has led the consolidation of the world steel industry and today ranks as the only truly global steelmaker.

ArcelorMittal is active in all major global markets, including automotive, construction, household appliances and packaging. The Group leads in R&D and technology, holds sizeable captive supplies of raw materials and operates extensive distribution networks.
